traits.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Oak has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

traits.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Oak has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Oak makes three attacks with his hooked daggers or his hand crossbow.

actions.name: Hooked Dagger
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +5 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage.
